g.title: Workflow
Start: AI-Driven Case Routing and Assignment · Future (TO-BE) Process Flows
g.text: Start: AI-Driven Case Routing and Assignment · Future (TO-BE) Process Flows

g.title: Happy #1: Case submitted via email, chat, or phone.
g.text: Happy #1: Case submitted via email, chat, or phone.

g.title: Start: AI-Driven Case Routing and Assignment · Future (TO-BE) Process Flows->Happy #1: Case submitted via email, chat, or phone.
Unhappy #1: AI fails to classify—escalated to manual review.
g.text: Unhappy #1: AI fails to classify—escalated to manual review.

g.title: Start: AI-Driven Case Routing and Assignment · Future (TO-BE) Process Flows->Unhappy #1: AI fails to classify—escalated to manual review.
Happy #2: AI analyzes content, urgency, and agent skill.
g.text: Happy #2: AI analyzes content, urgency, and agent skill.

g.title: Happy #1: Case submitted via email, chat, or phone.->Happy #2: AI analyzes content, urgency, and agent skill.
Happy #3: Case routed to optimal agent or Tier 2 Engineer.
g.text: Happy #3: Case routed to optimal agent or Tier 2 Engineer.

g.title: Happy #2: AI analyzes content, urgency, and agent skill.->Happy #3: Case routed to optimal agent or Tier 2 Engineer.
Happy #4: Real-time dashboard updates with status and routing rationale.
g.text: Happy #4: Real-time dashboard updates with status and routing rationale.

g.title: Happy #3: Case routed to optimal agent or Tier 2 Engineer.->Happy #4: Real-time dashboard updates with status and routing rationale.
Happy #5: Agent receives alert with full context and SLA details.
g.text: Happy #5: Agent receives alert with full context and SLA details.

g.title: Happy #4: Real-time dashboard updates with status and routing rationale.->Happy #5: Agent receives alert with full context and SLA details.
Unhappy #2: CRM integration fails—case flagged and logged.
g.text: Unhappy #2: CRM integration fails—case flagged and logged.

g.title: Unhappy #1: AI fails to classify—escalated to manual review.->Unhappy #2: CRM integration fails—case flagged and logged.
Unhappy #3: Data inconsistency detected—case held for audit and correction.
g.text: Unhappy #3: Data inconsistency detected—case held for audit and correction.

g.title: Unhappy #2: CRM integration fails—case flagged and logged.->Unhappy #3: Data inconsistency detected—case held for audit and correction.
